name: TextUnkown's AdventureGrounds
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 41 "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres"

My weekend was too busy to do a proper game, but I thought the theme was broken enough to make a quick snarky parody game… This was made in less than 6 Hours!

Credits 
  • HitchH1k3r (@HitchH1k3r, hitchh1k3rsguide.com)
